reply.content: Did you try to open the settings screen by going in your Android Wear app on your mobile? Then hit the gear icon displayed over the watch face preview.

author: YHVH 13315
comment: I DOWN LOADED THIS FAMTADTIC LOOKING APP ON MY SAMSUNG MOBILE  FOR MY CASIO WSD F20S ANDROIF WEAR WATCH .  BUT I CANNOT SEE THIS APP ON MY ANDROID  CAN YOU PLEASE ADVICE THANKS

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Did you also install the application on your watch by using the Google play store on your watch device? You must install it since Android Wear 2.

author: Pete Smith
comment: Excellent communication, I couldn't get this to work, with the advise I have this now on watch, very happy, thank you.👍👍

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi. Are you running Android Wear 2.0? If yes, did you install the watch face on both mobile and watch? 
You must install it on both device. Android wear 2.0 does not sync the application automatically as Android wear 1.5 did. Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com, I'll be happy to help you.

comment: I'm new to this whole faces thing. This is my first buy. I like it so far.

author: Patrice Dickey
comment: Only have one clock face. I tried the hold down on the clock face but I still only have one and it's a male type face. Not that bad but wanted the skill with roses

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. You can change the skull design displayed on the watch face, by accessing the settings of the watch face. Just hold your finger on your watch screen, and hit the gear icon displayed below the wf preview. The settings activity will be displayed.

author: Joanne Wilson
comment: Where do I find this once installed?! Not on my phone, app, or watch. Dev help please or I'll get refund.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi. Did you install the watch face on both mobile and watch? 
You must install it on both device. Android wear 2.0 does not sync the application automatically to the watch as Android wear 1.5 did.

And then retry the download, everything should be fine

author: Flordeliz Bruno
comment: I don't understand how to change the faces for my moto 360 sport.  😢😢😢

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. If you maintain your finger on your watch screen, and then hit the "gear" icon displayed under the watch face preview, you should be able to access to the settings screen to choose your face. Alternatively, you can go in the Android Wear app on your mobile, hit the gear icon over the watch face preview, and the mobile settings screen will show
